Template.SubjectPart: Your password is about to expired
Template.HtmlPart:
Hi {{firstName}},
Your password will be expired in {{expireDays}} days. Please don't forget to update before it expires!

What will happen if my password expired?
1. You won't be able to login to YourNextU Platform with your current password.
2. However, we still keepyour learning progress safe and sound!
